name: Sharon

services.title: Programming
services.description: Nine years of full-stack experience in TypeScript, Java, C++, Python, and Git, including programming particle filter localization, odometry, and PID for competitive robotics

services.title: Leadership & Collaboration
services.description: Extensive experience working and effectively collaborating in programming teams, including in leadership positions

services.title: Hardware
services.description: Experience with design, building, and electronics including building 3D printers and nitro RC cars

services.title: Trilingual
services.description: Native in English and Russian, fluent in French

aboutpara: Hi, my name is Sharon. I'm a high-school student who loves programming, robotics, and engineering. I am extremely motivated to continue developing my skills, especially in a workplace setting. In my free time, I also enjoy skiing and reading.
